cause.description:
We are here to call for a boycott of all Israeli products and activities untill it ends its occupation of all arab lands.
1. Israel should return the stolen land to the Palestinians
2. Israel should guarantee the right of return of all palestinian refugees with full compensation
3. Israel should treat all citizens equally whether they are jews, muslims or christians
cause.mission: Educate the people about the Israeli Aparthied and move the masses to boycott Israeli aparthied
cause.name: Boycott Israeli Apartheid
